error.title: Error!
error.adminError: You must be either an administrator or given a role to use this bot. If not configured, ask an administrator to use `/setrole` to set the role for bot use.
error.adminOnlyError: You must be an administrator to use this command.
error.setTickerError: You must set your ticker channel before using this command! Use `/settickerchannel`
error.noMessagePerms: The bot does not have permissions to use that channel.
error.notValidItem: That is not a valid item name!
error.notValidAlertID: That is not a valid alert id! Check `/alert list`
error.notBeingTracked: That item was not being tracked!
error.cmdError: There was an error while executing this command!
